nfcGetDetectResult

public int nfcGetDetectResult(NfcResult nfcResult)
                       throws android.os.RemoteException
Get the detected tag information.

Parameters:
nfcResult - receives the detected tag information.
Returns:
Zero indicates success; Nonzero indicates failure
Throws:
android.os.RemoteException

nfcSetDetect

public int nfcSetDetect(int tagType)
                 throws android.os.RemoteException
Enable the corresponding tag type to be detected.

Parameters:
tagType - Tag type to be detected. 
 "0x1" : detect mifare tag
 "0x2" : detect ISO15693 tag
 "0x4" : detect FELICA tag
 "0x8" : detect TYPEB tag
 "0xF" : detect all
Returns:
Zero indicates success; Nonzero indicates failure
Throws:
android.os.RemoteException
